altername_name: Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! We've Been Waiting for You
name: Pia Carrot e Youkoso!!
overview: During your last summer break of high school you begin working at the family restaurant "Pia Carrot", famous for it's cute uniforms. Here you meet girls of various personalities. Raise the girls' interest in you by adjusting your parameters, and look forward to falling in love with your chosen girl in this simulation adventure game!! In order to get a happy ending with the girl of your choice, you must first reach the target parameters for that girl. Parameters like "appearance" "kindness" "determination" "infamy" and "conversation". "Conversation" is the key to influence the girl's interest in you!! There are 7 selectable jobs for you to perform such as "waiter", "cashier", or "line cook". The jobs you choose have a direct impact on your chances to meet others, and the enhancement of your strength, determination, etc... Many areas have been prepared where you can meet girls including the school, the local park, karaoke box, and a cocktail bar!! You choose which uniform the girls wear. Color and design variations can be chosen to your liking!!
